metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Bleeri, the dwarf of the Steeps' Drunkards vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -104, 32, -93- Talk to the dwarf male behind The Blushing Mermaid,

0.speaker: Bleeri
0.text: Sorry, saer! Didn't get any on your shoes, did he, saer? Just a joke, saer, he didn't mean it.

1.speaker: Bleeri
1.text: One last binge is just what we needed, because tomorrow, we wake up as Flaming Fists!

2.speaker: Bleeri
2.text: Don't worry about him, he just had one too many, or maybe five.
